1.0.5.name: wordpress/background-control
1.0.5.description:
A simple and powerful plugin to control your Wordpress site's background. The plugin changes background color/image of the tag. The plugin comes with a butil-in image uploading script. So your background images live inside the plugin and you don't have to use Wordpress "media handler".

Features:

  • Image uploading
  • Archive with unlimited images
  • Url/link background image
  • Full CSS-control (repeat, fixed, positioning)
  • Color validation of hex-color values set to background-color.
